question: Identify A, B and C in the sequence:
<katex>$$CH_{3}CH_{2}Br \xrightarrow{KCN(alc)} A \xrightarrow{LiAlH_{4}} B \xrightarrow{HNO_{2}, 0^{\circ}C} C$$</katex>
explanation: 3. Reaction of primary aliphatic amine B with <katex>$HNO_2$</katex> (nitrous acid) gives alcohol: <katex>$CH_3CH_2CH_2OH$</katex> (Propan-1-ol) (C).
